considering Jesus is supposedly the son of God, I’m sure he could.[/quote]

But, just because your rep is 9 doesn’t mean you don’t know how to code. It just looks like you don’t appreciate some help.

item.title: [PI]changing pc point values [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

infalibl3:

need to change the value of some items…

Look up the id of the item in shopassistant.java so if its claws your trying to price look up 14484 and if nothing comes up add what it says below(just an example)
You would add this

case 14484:(item id) return 100;(price you want)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]changing pc point values [PI]
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

In the ShopAssistent class:

	public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {
		switch (id) {
			case 6889:
			case 6914:
			return 200;
			case 6916:
			case 6918:
			case 6920:
			case 6922:
			case 6924:
			return 50;
			case 11663:
			case 11664:
			case 11665:
			case 8842:
			return 30;
			case 8839:
			case 8840:
			return 75;
			case 10499:
			return 20;
			case 8845:
			return 5;
			case 8846:
			return 10;
			case 8847:
			return 15;
			case 8848:
			return 20;
			case 8849:
			case 8850:
			return 25;
			case 7462:
			return 40;
			case 10551:
			return 100;
		}
		return 0;
	}

It’s really simple, just change the return value for the items you want to change.

Read full topic
